channel.title: Christmas Craft Creations on Nancy's Creative Mess
channel.description: Recent content in Christmas Craft Creations on Nancy's Creative Mess

item.title: *Christmas Craft Creations August*
item.description: There’s still time to play along with the latest challenge at Christmas Craft Creations! I sure hope you’ll play along! My winter activity is playing in the snow…. you can see I had fun building an igloo and decorating it! In reality, I had more fun playing with my Glimmer Hot Foil Machine to create my snowy background LOL! Card Info *Cardstock: Stampin’ Up! Smokey Slate *Images: Mama Elephant Merry Greetings; MFT Polar Penguins

item.title: *Christmas Craft Creations July*
item.description: There’s still time to play along with the July theme of Patterned Paper at Christmas Craft Creations. This is a monthly challenge that helps you get at least one Christmas card made every month. The design team always has such wonderful creations… you should check them out! I got this one sheet of patterned paper at a garage sale and I honestly don’t know why I bought it. I don’t scrapbook and honestly the design on it is really not suited to cutting down for Christmas cards.

item.title: *Christmas Craft Creations Trees*
item.description: There’s still some time to play along with the Christmas Craft Creations June theme of TREES! This is a great challenge to help you get a few Christmas cards made throughout the year. I had promised myself to make more Christmas cards before October and while I’ve done that, it’s really only been for this challenge! Maybe I should make one day a month where I make only Christmas cards.

item.title: *Christmas Craft Creations April 2022*
item.description: There’s still time to play along with the Christmas Craft Creations April challenge! We’d love to see your Christmas cards using plaid or tartan! When plaid first started being popular (again), I resisted it. I honestly wasn’t a big fan. But over the years it’s grown on me! There’s just something about a good old red and black buffalo check…. I had fun with some Stampin’ Up plaid papers and the L’il Gnome from Simon Says Stamp
